alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Davidson; Guilford; Orange; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 11:47AM EDT until July 09 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alamance County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Orange County in central North Carolina... Southern Davidson County in central North Carolina... Randolph County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Guilford County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1147 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monroeton to near McLeansville to 8 miles east of High Point to 8 miles south of Thomasville to near Spencer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, Burlington, Asheboro, Lexington, Graham, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Siler City and Thomasville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.

area.areaDesc: Alamance; Chatham; Davidson; Guilford; Orange; Randolph
